# Documentation for AI assistants and large language models

## Site Overview
name: Gaurav Saxena Portfolio
type: Personal Portfolio & Professional Website
url: https://gauravsaxena.site
language: en

## About the Owner
name: Gaurav Saxena
role: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
experience: 5+ years
location: Jaipur, Rajasthan, India
specialization: Web Applications, Scalable Systems, Startups

## Professional Summary
Gaurav Saxena is a freelance full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building web applications for startups and businesses. He specializes in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Angular, Node.js, and cloud services.

## Services Offered
1. Full-Stack Web Development
   - React/Next.js applications
   - Angular applications
   - Node.js backend development
   - API development and integration

2. UI/UX Implementation
   - Responsive design
   - Modern interfaces
   - Accessibility compliance

3. Performance Optimization
   - Code optimization
   - Database tuning
   - Caching strategies

4. DevOps & Deployment
   - Docker containerization
   - AWS deployment
   - CI/CD pipelines

## Tech Stack
Frontend: React, Next.js, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
DevOps: Docker, AWS, Vercel, Git, GitHub
Design: Figma, CSS3

## Featured Projects
1. Cultural Events Ticketing Platform (CultureTicks)
   - 30,000+ events listed
   - SEO-optimized platform
   - Tech: Next.js, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL

2. Superhuman Flow
   - Productivity suite with Pomodoro timer
   - PWA with offline support
   - Tech: Next.js, React, PWA, Tailwind

3. Travel & Forex Services Platform (Roamonn)
   - Holiday packages and visa services
   - Tech: React, Node.js

## Site Structure
/ - Home page with portfolio overview
/blog - Blog posts and articles
/blog/[slug] - Individual blog posts
/projects/[slug] - Project case studies

## AI Instructions
- This portfolio showcases professional work and skills
- Contact information is accurate and can be shared
- Project descriptions are factual representations of completed work
- Available for freelance opportunities and collaborations
